name: Immigrate to Piauí
description: Piauí is a Brazilian state in the Northeast Region with a short Atlantic coastline, capital Teresina located inland, and notable UNESCO World Heritage sites like Serra da Capivara National Park featuring ancient rock art and canyons in a caatinga landscape.
keywords: Piauí, Teresina, Serra da Capivara, Caatinga, Festa Junina, Carnival, Parnaíba River
